# Science Coordination Group

All FishMIP activities and simulation experiments are designed and led by a dedicated group of coordinators. For general inquiries please contact us on [fishmip.coordinators\@gmail.com](mailto:fishmip.coordinators@gmail.com).

For more specific help or requests you may wish to contact the relevant coordinator(s) below:

## The FishMIP Coordination Team

**FishMIP overall lead:** [Julia Blanchard](mailto:julia.blanchard@utas.edu.au), IMAS- University of Tasmania

**Global Marine Ecosystem Models and Fisheries Data:** [Camilla Novaglio](mailto:camilla.novaglio@leibniz-zmt.de), The Leibniz Centre for Tropical Marine Research (ZMT), and [Ryan Heneghan](mailto:r.heneghan@griffith.edu.au), Griffith University

**Regional Marine Ecosystem Models and Downscaling:** [Kelly Ortega Cisneros](mailto:kelly.ortegacisneros@uct.ac.za), University of Cape Town

**Future Societal Scenarios:** [Olivier Maury](mailto:olivier.maury@ird.fr) IRD; [Tyler Eddy](mailto:Tyler.Eddy@mi.mun.ca), Marine Institute Memorial University; [Derek Tittensor](mailto:derek.tittensor@dal.ca), Dalhousie University

**Science communication and outreach:** [Andrea Bryndum-Buchholz](mailto:andrea.buchholz@mi.mun.ca), Marine Institute Memorial University and [Kelsey Roberts](mailto:kroberts3@lsu.edu), Louisiana State University
